body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Places               Places             Visitor Center at Valley Forge NHP   Recommended first stop while visiting Valley Forge National Historical Park            Washington's Headquarters   The headquarters for Gen. Washington during the Valley Forge winter encampment.        Muhlenberg Brigade Huts   Reconstructed huts built to Gen. Washington's specifications. Also, this is the main site for Valley Forge's Living History program.              PC Knox Estate   A brief history of the PC Knox Estate of Valley Forge.        Monuments   Pictures of Monuments and Markers at Valley Forge.        Washington Memorial Chapel   Information about Washington Memorial Chapel
title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Places
